text: Bernard Vifian (16 December 1944 - 18 June 2012) was a Swiss racing cyclist. He was the Swiss National Road Race champion in 1969. He also rode in the 1967 and 1970 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1944 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:People from the canton of Geneva Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Bernard Vifian
